definition[0]: a semi-skilled worker has some skills related to the job they do, but is not fully skilled
definition[1]: a semi-skilled job is one that you need some skills to do, but you do not have to be highly skilled
definition[2]: semi-skilled workers are not in highly skilled or professional jobs, but need some special skills to do their job
example[2]: It would sometimes take months to fillsemi-skilled assembly jobs.
